lines.text: [first lines]
[Boots, Woody and Jeepers blunder into a shootout between lawmen and enemy agents]

[to one of the spies]
Drop it!

[to the entertainers]
It's okay. Sorry you got caught in the middle.
What's goin' on?
Spies.
Spies?
That's right - over in Acme City and in these hills. They're all over the place.
[Boots screams when she sees a gorilla, which disappears before Woody and Jeepers turn around]
It could have been my imagination.
Boy, between the three of us, there's sure a lot of imaginatin' goin' on.
[looking at a gorgeous woman on the viewscreen]
Who are you?
Agent Ming Toy - 38-24-36.
You awake?
I'm awake. How do you expect me to sleep with you roamin' around half the night?
Sorry about that, Chief.
Boots! Boots!
Where are you, Boots? Check the closet. Anything in there?
Nothing but a weirdwolf... A weirdwolf!
[Jeepers and Woody flee]
[Jeepers has fallen into an empty grave]
What are you doin' down there?
Well, I ain't lookin' for new talent.
Have you ever heard of M.O.T.H.E.R.?
M.O.T.H.E.R.? Hey, that spells "mother".
I know "Mother McCree" and some other songs about mother.
"M.O.T.H.E.R." is "Master Organization to Halt Enemy Resistance".
